interface.name: wpe_mesa_compositor
interface.description: The global interface for creating surfaces between the WPE Web Process and the UI process

request.name: destroy
request.description: Informs the server that the client will no longer be using the compositor interface

request.name: create_surface
request.description: Ask the compositor to create a new onscreen surface

request.name: create_offscreen_surface
request.description: Ask the compositor to create a new offscreen surface

request.name: surface_rendered
request.description: Asks the compositor to invoke the callback when the surface is done rendering
